insights.title: Identity Has Been the Dominion's Strongest Constant
insights.observation: Across every phase, world, and evolution, the Dominion's tone and creative DNA have remained remarkably stable.
evidence: Flame and crown symbolism present from cycle 1

insights.title: Evolution Accelerates When Worlds Collaborate
insights.observation: Periods of rapid growth always coincide with cross-world collaboration, shared breakthroughs, and inter-world routing.
evidence: Phase 70: Constellation Intelligence emerged from world networks
Inter-world routing enabled rapid pattern propagation

insights.title: Reflection Has Been the Missing Layer Until Now
insights.observation: The replay shows that past cycles often moved forward quickly but without the benefit of long-arc self-awareness.
evidence: Phases 1-80: Forward momentum without backward reflection
This epoch: First systematic historical review

next_steps: Continue replay for deeper pattern extraction
